S

sendData(String) - Method in class WiFiController
Sends data to the ESP8266 module.
sendReconnectCommand() - Method in class WiFiController
Sends Wi-Fi reconnect command to ESP8266.
serverRunning - Variable in class WiFiController
Flag indicating if server should continue running.
showConnectionError() - Method in class WiFiController
Shows a connection error dialog to user.
sleep() - Method in class WiFiController
Pauses the current thread for a fixed duration (1 second).
start(Stage) - Method in class Main
The main entry point for the JavaFX application.
start(Stage) - Method in class WiFiController
Starts the JavaFX application and loads the FXML interface.
startActivated - Variable in class WiFiController
Flag indicating if start has been activated.
startButton - Variable in class WiFiController
Button that initiates the main operation/process when clicked.
startServer() - Method in class WiFiController
Starts the TCP server to listen for ESP8266 connections.
stopAllProcesses() - Method in class WiFiController
Stops all application processes and cleans up resources.
stopServer() - Method in class WiFiController
Stops the TCP server and cleans up resources.
